# RCSService.BusinessInformationRequest

**Structure**

A structure representing a request to retrieve information about a business.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BusinessInformationRequest
```

## Overview

To create an instance of this type, use the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/CellularServiceID] and [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSHandle] from an [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage] you receive in the RCS service’s [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/incomingMessageNotifications]. Then call [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/businessInformation(for:)] on the RCS service, which returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/Business] type.

## Creating a business information request

- **init(cellularServiceID:handle:cachePolicy:)**

## Accessing request properties

- **cellularServiceID**: Service identifier to use for this request.
- **handle**: URI handle of the target.
- **cachePolicy**: Cache policy to use for request.
- **RCSService.BusinessInformationRequest.CachePolicy**: `

## Retrieving business information

- **businessInformation(for:)**: Requests business information for a specified handle.
- **RCSService.Business**: Structure containing details about a business.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
